DEMO_314_MSG_010:
̃Yetas, you fool! I had nothing to do with Silver's death! 
Why must you continue with your lies!?
DEMO_314_MSG_020: ́Arguing is pointless, Toto! Now, that thing hanging around your neck... a coward like yourself has no right wearing that!
DEMO_314_MSG_030:
̃This is hopeless! He's not going to listen... 
Not until I can be proven innocent, that is!
DEMO_314_MSG_040: ̃ȁ! You must investigate Silver's death for me, and, once and for all, figure out what actually happened!
DEMO_314_MSG_050:
̃Within Eastern Polar Park is a graveyard called the Frozen Graveyard!
ā
DEMO_314_MSG_060:
̃You must go there and find Silver's coffin! I'm hoping, like he always did, that he left some sort of clue behind!
ā
DEMO_314_MSG_070: ̃With Yetas's gang here, the area is no longer under their surveillance! Hurry, I'll keep them all busy here!
DEMO_314_MSG_080:
̃I'm bettin' everything I've got on you!
You've got to pull through for us, ȁ
